> I'm=
 not sure if this is exactly what you want, but I have some code

rallelizes the neural network evaluations in Ken's rtNEAT

into 
> a single server=
 farming out jobs over RPC to some number of 
clients. 
> The code isn't pa=
rticularly elegant (i.e. it requires that the 
> clients and server have a =
shared disk space), but I can probably 
> clean it up enough for it to be u=
sable if you're interested.
> 
> PS: One other caveat: the code was designe=
d to be run over a fairly 
> large number of nodes (200+), so for the case =
where you're 
> parallelizing over, e.g., multiple cores on a single comput=
er, you 
> might be better off taking up Colin's offer instead.

> -- Joe=
